author: ritchiem
msg: Allowed more of the constants to be set via system properties.

author: ritchiem
msg: Caused each of these tests to run 10 times to help identify any race conditions that were occuring.
Updated the CommitRollbackTest to be more robust in the detection of failure.

author: dandiep
msg: Change the <bus> element to use a core namespace. Add nice XML support for the logging feature in the core namespace.
